title: FONT for ZARA
content:
Hey all,

I need to know what font ZARA uses for its logo?

Thank you :-)
author: d

comments.content:
Probably that you should post an image (sample) so people that dont know the logo (or the version of it) can see it and try to help you.

António

Ok, thank you! Here is the image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211718im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brand_4541.gif)

I think it is a combination of two typefaces

The R could be caslon/roman

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon/3-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon/3-roman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon/3-roman/")

And The ZA could be the same font with the serif's chopped off or

Prado BQ-Med

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/prado-bq/med-osf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/prado-bq/med-osf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/prado-bq/med-osf/")

Good luck,
